txt.en: You have found the barracks of Uzbad-bakân, at the back of which stand a vicious Orc-leader and his rallying banner to give constant reinforcement to the soldiers of Moria.
You have found the barracks of Uzbad-bakân, at the back of which stand a vicious Orc-leader and his rallying banner to give constant reinforcement to the soldiers of Moria.
Rûgh and his banner can be found in the barracks of Uzbad-bakân in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should defeat Rûgh and burn his banner.
You have defeated the leader of Uzbad-bakân, an evil Orc named Rûgh. With his banner destroyed and his constant chanting silenced, the Orcs of Zelem-melek will be less organized in their attacks.
Rûgh and his banner can be found in the barracks of Uzbad-bakân in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should defeat Rûgh and burn his banner.
You have defeated the leader of Uzbad-bakân, an evil Orc named Rûgh. With his banner destroyed and his constant chanting silenced, the Orcs of Zelem-melek will be less organized in their attacks.
Defeat Rûgh and burn his banner
